reviews.review_msg: man this class was bad. i'm a first semester transfer and I have to say I expected some more professional teachers than this... it's like she taught two classes.. the online tutorial gives you the meat and potatoes and then colleen just rambles on for hours, the class constantly clowned her... also why did she force us to read her stupid shorthand?

Colleen should not be teaching Criminology, she will make you second guess your choice of major. Her lectures are boring and pedantic. During one class she explained that she was a hard marker because "I need to get hired again next term". I seriously regret taking this class with her.

Hilary is a great prof. She is not easy but gives you many chances to do well. Hard, but if you attend all the lectures and take notes on what she says in class you are guaranteed to do well. The people who complain about her being tough are definitely the ones who don't listen to her instructions,she is crystal clear about how to do well.
At first I did not get the feel for Adrienne's teaching methods, but as I took more of her classes she became a lot easier to understand. Definitely in my top five favorite teachers.

Lectures were interesting and short. If you're in your first year I highly recommend you don't take this course. First year students were not ready for his tests and papers. 2nd year students will do much better in this course (A or B)  Midterm average 60% Term paper average 55%  Majority of class either failedgot a C. Two people received A.
